sentence: Florida's Republican Governor Ron DeSantis has signed legislation enacting a new state holiday while announcing a mandate requiring public school students to learn about the "atrocities" imposed by communist regimes.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: Ron DeSantis Establishes 'Victims of Communism Day' Holiday Amid CRT Fight

sentence: Florida's Republican Governor Ron DeSantis has signed legislation enacting a new state holiday while announcing a mandate requiring public school students to learn about the "atrocities" imposed by communist regimes.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: Ron DeSantis Establishes 'Victims of Communism Day' Holiday Amid CRT Fight

sentence: pic.twitter.com/Ojlao8f46t Ron DeSantis (@GovRonDeSantis) May 9, 2022 I appreciate this initiative and the fact that we are honoring the victims of communism by teaching young people about the evils of communism and the moral obligation we have to stop it,? Cuban human rights activist Rosa Mara Pay said in response to the legislation, according to the press release.
author: WND News Services
title: Now Florida to teach students 'evils of communism'

sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis recently signed a "Stop Woke Act" to end Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) efforts in the workplace.
author: Summer Rose
title: Improve the Health of Black Women. Make Racial Trauma at Work Extinct | Opinion
